lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: I believe that when you give, it will come back to you or your family.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate family team meetings for children who have lived most of their lives in foster or group homes and are being adopted or going to live with a family member or fic-of kin.

lender.name: Marcy
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough that I can, and I like to share my little bit of prosperity with those for whom it will make a substantial difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an electric company and help to make sure that those who need electricity can get it.

lender.name: Charley
lender.loan_because: I am blessed beyond measure and believe in "paying it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I'm a consultant in the entertainment pyrotechnics (fireworks) industry. I'm also active in community preservation and protection.

lender.name: DAVID
lender.loan_because: I was very impressed with what I saw on Public Broadcasting in the States. I was once upon a time a VISTA/Peace Corps volunteer. Originally going to Nicaragua, but in 1978 there was "political unrest". I ended up staying in the States in VISTA. I am very interested in working with the world. It's the only way!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Director of a world-wide company that is involved with Advertising and Packaging. I've worked with many people from many countries.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do! To help someone else who is trying to make a living for themselves and their family is a small thank you for the peace in my life.

lender.name: Angel
lender.loan_because: It's important to help people not only get on their feet, but keep them standing. That is what makes Kiva cool: you know that your loan is going to help support people into the future.

lender.name: Daisy
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people making a living in their country.
lender.occupational_info: I paint porcelain objects, from small boxes to whole dinner sets. I use mineral colors and 24 K gold and fire to make the piece permanent.

lender.name: Heather Whinna
lender.loan_because: I should.
lender.occupational_info: Independent Filmmaker

lender.name: Mark & Laura
lender.loan_because: For the love of Jesus Christ

lender.name: BEMARIS
lender.loan_because: We are three ladies who meet for lunch once a month. We would like to make a difference in someone's life since we are all three blessed in ours.
lender.occupational_info: We are two volunteers (Marilyn and Chris) and an employee (Becky) of the Humane Society Boulder Valley.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed in this life and would like to share my blessings with others who with a helping hand can rise up out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a small high school working with many wonderful young people, some of whom struggle with poverty. My husband and I also own two small businesses so we know how difficult it is to start and maintain a business. We want to help other entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Elle
lender.loan_because: I believe that individuals who are willing to try to better themselves should be given an opportunity to earn a better life.

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: I want to help to improve other people's lives.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: It feels good

lender.name: Jesús
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows less favoured people to grow on their own merits. It generates real value in their countries and it is almost effortless for the contributors.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of the brand marketing teams at a worldwide known US company in Spain and Portugal.

lender.name: Gay
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who haven't had the luck to be born in a rich country, have two parents or just not had the opportunities I have had.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to teenagers - great kids who keep me on my toes!

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to help spread prosperity in order to help foster a more stable world for all.
lender.occupational_info: I develop commercial scale solar energy projects for the federal government, especially the Dept of Defense.

lender.name: Norm
lender.loan_because: Kiva's clients are looking for a helping hand, not a handout. It's good for me and hopefully good for them.
lender.occupational_info: I help robots and computers work and play together.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I like making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and learn so I can prepare for college. I plan on becoming a biologist.

lender.name: Antje
lender.loan_because: small entrepreneurs need working capital and banks no longer provide it.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I believe that the top down method as used by the World Bank and others simply does not work very well. The despots that run most of these contries steal at least a lions share. I do believe that if you help people by providing them with the ability to build their wealth and confidence then, eventually, they may well demand and receive better governance from their leaders.

lender.name: Kristian
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting people all over the world who are hard working, driven, and doing everything they can to improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that provides major funding for education and medical research.

lender.name: Cyndee
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can help others who happen to be born into less fortunate circumstances than I. Life is nothing without contributions to humanity and service to others.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Its a way to help others
lender.occupational_info: Non-profit

lender.name: Marshall
lender.loan_because: Recently my son and his wife donated some Kiva credit, in my name, as a Christmas present. I have inturned loaned it out to two business groups.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired but was a Banker for over 30 years. My business was to lend money to people and businesses to help purchase property and equipment.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: It's neat to help out others reach a goal that they have set for themselves and grow their business.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the courtroom with law enforcment to punish those who choose to break the law.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: The reward of giving is such a tremendous reward,

lender.name: Debbie & David
lender.loan_because: We have great respect for those who have to struggle more in life than we do. It means a lot to us to give people the power to have control over their lives in a manner that also is worthy of respect. Our help is very humble. Any joy it can help bring to another being is a joy to us. We live for our children, the same as those who need our assistance.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I love to help people helping themselves!
lender.occupational_info: Marketing

lender.name: Janelle and Godwill
lender.loan_because: The little that we have in this world should be shared, and the blessing we recieve should be treasured.
lender.occupational_info: I screen the health of those who are trying to donate plasma. My husband works with those who have substance abuse addictions.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: It's important to help those with the ambition and drive but with no means. Everyone can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large insurance company in their Information Technology department

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I have made my living as an entrepreneur and know that with help others can have my same success.
lender.occupational_info: I am writing a book right now called "Setting Our Hearts Right: Personal Choices about Energy and the Environment". I am not as pretty or as young as Abi whose picture I have included in my profile. She is a racehorse I saved from death after she got injured. She is one of the many joys of my life.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I care and respect others who want to make a difference in this world and they're families.

lender.name: BIll and Jan Smith
lender.loan_because: We all need to start somewhere and this has a very viral affect on not just helping someone out out monetarily but helping the emotional being and the community.
lender.occupational_info: I help other business sell their products more productivly and profitably

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: Microfinance can have a profound impact on world populations with excellent success rate of motivated small business people using the Kiva business plan. Teach them to fish, don't just donate fish!
lender.occupational_info: Retired as a U.S. Naval Officer and military engineer after 40 years.

lender.name: raelene and jose
lender.loan_because: we are so blessed! with health, love and success, it is our hearts duty to help those needing it. WE LUV THIS SITE!
lender.occupational_info: Jose is a Certified Public Accountant. Raelene is a Graphic Designer.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a lot and appreciate that I can help others.

lender.name: Linda and Jerry
lender.loan_because: We have been so very blessed in our lives and we believe that we all should be our brother's keepers!

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start up one's own business.
lender.occupational_info: I bake bread and pastries, and cook

lender.name: Duncan
lender.loan_because: It's a dog-eat-dog world out there. We can make it better.

lender.name: Floyd
lender.loan_because: It's fun to see people succeed.

lender.name: Santo Bartez
lender.loan_because: i loan because i hope i am helping make a difference, even a small one, in someone's life. it's easy and fun plus i like bacon.
lender.occupational_info: i help develop software for a pharmacy services / software company.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: others have helped me

lender.name: Marshall
lender.loan_because: The good Lord has allowed me to.

lender.name: timothy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a great chance at hope and its Gods will that we help each other.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a county clinic in California. I give vaccinations, and help sick and injured people.

lender.name: keith
lender.loan_because: after visiting several countries,i have seen the needs of many entrepreneurs as well as the hard work ethics they have. I am greatfull to be able to help out a bit.
lender.occupational_info: we own and operate a small mom and pop sandwich shop

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: I have the resources and it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place and I want people who are not as fortunate as me to be happy. They deserve better and im happy i can help them in this way.

lender.name: Edwina
lender.loan_because: I believe it's my duty as a Christian to take a portion of what I have been blessed with to help someone else. My 20 year career in the US Air Force afforded me the opportunity to visit and live in several third world countries and I know for certain that without programs such as KIVA, many people in these countries will never get the chance to experience entrepreneurship and will remain in poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a contractor employee on a US military base.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: A few less lattes, change someone's life.....priceless.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a wonderful surgeon, taking care of patients in my community.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone's life with such a small effort. I want to enable someone to make their life better, and to make their community stronger

lender.name: Jeff
lender.occupational_info: I rent photo booths for private events like weddings.

lender.name: Vinnie
lender.loan_because: It feels good make a little effort for a good cause. I believe in business.
lender.occupational_info: I film snow sports all over the world. I also paint houses and businesses to support myself during summer time.

lender.name: Sophie
lender.loan_because: It's great to assist fantastic, strong women build a secure and happy future for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Staci
lender.loan_because: I believe this program is empowering to the people who receive the loans and those who give.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: it gives me something to do that's not about me.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an appellate court attorney in the U.S. Every day I get to try to do the right thing. It's a good job.

lender.name: Kaitlin
lender.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference.

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want every person on this planet to know that they matter and that they are loved by someone and they are worth receiving help if that's what they need. When someone in need reaches out for help I want there to always be hand there to grasp.

lender.name: Paulette
lender.loan_because: it was a new way for me to reach out to someone.
lender.occupational_info: Hard. Tough. Not financially rewarding. But very important. I teach 90 students a day about various types of math, and interact with dozens more.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I am Muslim and very much want to help Islamic enterprise.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: i like to help people and these people need help
lender.occupational_info: I am in a student in the 6th grade.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I see potential in who I loan to and get great joy in helping others succeed.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to do be able to do something great.
lender.occupational_info: I am the products manager for a company who develops energy saving lighting control sensors.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: I make stuff (software) that can be used on a computer.

lender.name: mary jane
lender.loan_because: this is an opportunity for my small donation bo multiply the opportunities for so many.
lender.occupational_info: A mom and a writer

lender.name: ANSC
lender.loan_because: Every holiday, the ANSC ladies have decided to not give each other gifts but to make a charitable donation in the name of ANSC.
lender.occupational_info:
The four of us met while working at Asians for Miracle Marrow Matches (A3M), a nonprofit that works to find bone marrow matches for those in need.
Now we are all working in different jobs. Collectively we work for Los Angeles Unified School District, Stanford University, St. Baldrick's Foundation and the Little Tokyo Service Center

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: This isn't charity, it's support for small businesses. And small businesses are the backbone of the economy.
lender.occupational_info: that no family be left behind

lender.name: Edmund
lender.loan_because: It is important to give to those who have less now so they can give to those who have less later.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.occupational_info: I work for the 4th largest bank in the US as a financial center manager who oversees the daily operations of the branch, sales, service and employee development within the branch.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people be able to help themselves. A hand out is one thing but to help people expand their business or send their children to school helps to break the cycle of poverty. It feels great to know you are making a difference and changing the world one person at a time.

lender.name: jean
lender.loan_because: It is a joy to do so.

lender.name: The Plata Family
lender.loan_because: To give hard working people an opportunity at a better life.

lender.name: The Ray Family
lender.loan_because: My family and I have been very fortunate with great opportunities. We would like to be part of helping/creating opportunity for others as we were helped.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: It's helpful.
lender.occupational_info: I build an online community for university students.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurial people in developing countries to create their own future. I love to travel to developing countries and this is a great way to give back!
lender.occupational_info: I deal with the ups and downs of the stock market every day.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: These loans are not a handout, they are a "leg up".
lender.occupational_info: I develop and market health care software for managing infectious disease outbreaks

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: it should be done. Cliché I know but people need a help up not a hand out. I only wish more people in the world were like these people; attempting to make a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I sub high school and middle school occasionally and when I'm not doing that I'm writing papers on history topics.

lender.name: Candace
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from working for the U.S. government.

lender.name: laura
lender.occupational_info: I help make medications in a hospital.

lender.name: Fred & Gloria
lender.loan_because: To help others

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: As a young child we were very poor and many times my family ate only because others helped us. I have not forgotten those days and though I am not rich, I am not poor, and want to help others move forward in life as I have been helped. I believe true wealth is in the heart and deposits are made in this bank when helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals who are aged or disabled and help them get more money for food and medicine.

lender.name: Annemarie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to work and need financial assistance
lender.occupational_info: I make sculptures using recycled material.

lender.name: Linda Sue
lender.loan_because: giving back gives purpose to one's life.

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: I've received so much. Now it is time to give.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who has the self motiviation to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people become better leaders.

lender.name: Hugo
lender.loan_because: Such as nice and easy way to make the difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Glenn n Damaris
lender.occupation: Fast Food, Ice Crean n Pizza Biz
lender.loan_because: . We can so we should..........
lender.occupational_info:
. It is twenty four + years now being self employed in the food industry.
I am happy I followed thru n fulfilled a childhood dream of being the "ice cream man". However, candidly, I am un happy that I did not move on to other bigger, better, more challenging n rewarding things.
Now at the age of 58, I now realize I am a "one trick pony".
However,
I do truly realize that it is better to be a one trick pony than a NO Trick Pony....... .

lender.name: Calvin
lender.loan_because:
I am always a proponent of "teaching someone to fish rather than giving them the fish". I am intrigued by the Kiva idea and am excited to have the opportunity to help someone who has a dream, a plan, and the determination to become econmically independent. I dream about the world will one day be rid of poverty. I support any mean that will help us achieve this goal. Anyone who has the will to improve their standard of living deserves a chance, a helping hand, and a lot of love.
In addition, I will take great interest to see if I can make a good investor - by counting my repaid loans.
lender.occupational_info: I make use of information through computer systems and programming.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: With the risk so small, and the potential to help so great, who could resist the opportunity to help others and make the world a better place?
lender.occupational_info: Our university-affiliated projects help citizens and government to know the status of our water resources and ways that they can protect their quality and quantity.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student in the United States. I am currently persuing my undergraduate degree in Dietetics.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I am thrilled to help other people start businesses of their own and experience the reward of supporting their families while enjoying the freedom of owning thier own business!
lender.occupational_info: I own a bridal salon and sell wedding dresses.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: "Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love." Lao-Tzu
lender.occupational_info: I manage a library.

lender.name: Wade
lender.loan_because: I like that people are able to create better futures for themselves and others in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I am an electrical engineering student and I tutor part time in math and engineering.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage initiative.
lender.occupational_info: Helping businesses be more successful through developing their people.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I used to live and work with women in W. Africa; I want to continue to support the amazing work that I witnessed among my friends there.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my responsibility to help people who have fewer resources than I do. I am profoundly grateful for this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people in the United States who are facing the death penalty. Through extensive interviews, record collection and background investigation, I work to find information that will mitigate a sentence of death. I present the information I find to juries in an effort to convince them not to vote for the death penalty.

lender.name: Andrew and Holly
lender.loan_because: we want to set an example for our kids.
lender.occupational_info: Holly teaches kindergarten and Andrew helps communities clean up pollution.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It feels good to have the opportunity to help fellow citizens of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I design custom furniture from sustainably harvested wood. Taking care of the environment is very important to me. I hope the individuals I loan to will make a commitment to their environment since we all live in the same beautiful world.

lender.name: One World One People
lender.occupation: microfinance might be the solution to poverty
lender.loan_because: This organization is for the people and that's a good thing, as it grows hopefully it will stay the same. Good job everyone.

lender.name: Monty H
lender.loan_because: I feel that whilst I enjoy comforts of life, I understand many don't.
lender.occupational_info: I help established companies realise their online potential.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: i want to help people. i know that my Kiva lends is helping people, their businesses, and that it is truly making an impact.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women across the globe.

lender.name: judy
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: ... I care!
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of socially relevant topics to help generate awareness through my photographic work.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: I like to be able to help others who are less fortunate and be able to see exactly what my money loaned is being used for and what the users are doing with it. It is good to actually see results. :)

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: It is a small way to help out in the world

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Neale-Query family
lender.loan_because: Generation by generation our family has been taught to give more than you receive. Kiva is one of many ways that we can continue to work for others. Money is like manure: it doesn't do any good unless you spread it around.

lender.name: aquelina
lender.loan_because: I feel everybody should have a chance to grow and pursue their happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I'm always looking for ways to make people around me happy and appreciated. My work is rewarding and exiting.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I feel the only way to promote peace and understanding throughout the world is by allowing people the opportunity to succeed on their own.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children about compassion and giving. I design programs that allow them to become involved in helping less fortunate people in their community and around the world.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: My parents suggested this site and gave me a head start.
lender.occupational_info: I review and approve much larger loans for purchasing houses. Those loans are based on numerous set rules. I get to decide for myself where to lend money through Kiva.

lender.name: Carol, Q and LA
lender.loan_because: We all need to be involved with helping people who are doing something to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Taking care of my family.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I know that I am blessed and I would like to pass those blessings on to others.

lender.name: elaine
lender.loan_because: I have 3 wonderful daughters and 2 grandchildren and know how lucky I am, and would like the opportunity to help someone else.

lender.name: Steph
lender.loan_because: I have lived with people in absolute poverty, and I can help make a little difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I use my position as an educator to teach young people about the inequality of the world's systems.

lender.name: Swoloshyn
lender.occupational_info: KINGSTON Ontario Canada

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: I think it's vital that we help one another.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Sales Manager for a Tea Company

lender.name: Irma
lender.loan_because: I can no longer wait for others to help. It has to start with me. If I can help in any way possible, I would.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to mold young minds to become who they want to be.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: "In everything I did, I showed you that by this kind of hard work we must help the weak, remembering the words the Lord Jesus himself said: 'It is more blessed to give than to receive.' " Acts 20:35

lender.name: Janel
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a great life and want to give to others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I keep the financial records for small businesses.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I think this is a brilliant way to help advance the well being of motivated people who just need a little from us who are able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the construction of condominiums and apartment buildings.

lender.name: Andrea, CJ, Jack & Tess
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Miranda Family
lender.occupational_info: Work in Software Industry

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe that free markets are the best way to create wealth for the greatest number of people. Free markets and capitalism, when properly applied, lift people out of poverty and increases the quality of life for people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I advise people on how to invest their money to maximize their returns and to reduce their investment risk. My goal is to make sure my clients have plenty of money for a secure and comfortable retirement and to provide for their children's education and weddings.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I own my own bussiness and understand the freedom and wonderful feeling of being responsible for your own well being and to provide work for others, because of your business, is a blessing in itself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a custom commercial and residential interior and exterior painter. Who is starting school at 43 yrs old, to hopefully change to a new career. 15 yrs of painting is long enough for me.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I like empowering others to sustain themselves. Kiva is a wonderful way to share!
lender.occupational_info: Finance

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: I think that if we can make a positive impact, even if it is small, we have accomplished our reason for being here.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Occupational Therapist. I help people that have been injured or have a disease or illness return to as normal life as possible.

lender.name: wayne
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner who started with a small truck and some brushes and now runs a very successful painting company. I understand how much starting a small business can change someones life. I want to give something back.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: How amazing it is to be able to help those that are trying to help themselves -- in another country! I love it. :)
lender.occupational_info: Environmental Public Relations and Communications

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in global economics, venture capital, and novel risk mitigation tactics

lender.name: Gail and Grant
lender.loan_because: It's a very little amount for us and it can make such a big difference to others.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small factory which embroiders and screenprints designs onto clothes. I have 10 employees.

lender.name: Faisal
lender.occupation: Asst. Dean at a Community College
lender.loan_because: The honor, dignity and self esteem of my fellow humans is very important to me. I will do my part to fight poverty as long as I live.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a college to help educate our future leaders/learners to be better world citizens.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Well, this original loan was a gift from a friend for my Birthday. I've never heard of Kiva before, but it seems like a great idea. My wife, son and I are honored to be able to help others and hopefully, we can do more in the future.
lender.occupational_info: I work as part of a health care team helping individuals rehabilitate from injuries, illness, surgery.

lender.name: Erick
lender.loan_because: Money is best spent empowering people.
lender.occupational_info: I design electrical devices for wireless communication.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it seems like a simple enough way to make a small difference

lender.name: Janine
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the effort it takes in starting and maintaining your own business successfully. A jump start for someone trying to support themselves and their family can make a world of difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am the controller for a small business owned by my husband.

lender.name: Colin Maggs
lender.loan_because:
I think the idea of KIVA is so awesome... "help the world's working poor make great strides towards economic independence"
Mother Teresa said: "In this life we can not always do great things. But we can do small things with great love."
I am proud to be a part of such an organization.
lender.occupational_info: I am an individual who believes that one can make a difference.

lender.name: robert
lender.loan_because: it empowers people and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help people that are gravely ill.

lender.name: Cameron King
lender.loan_because: I believe it's part of Jesus' Great Commission to think and act globally as well as locally to bring His Kingdom into people's lives. It costs very little to make a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a church to impact college students at WVU on a spiritual level; I help them mature in their relationship with Christ.

lender.name: Simone
lender.loan_because: I've always believed in the concept of micro-loans, admiring the efforts in Bangladesh, and to think that I can now directly participate is sublime. It's amazing.

lender.name: Danielle & John
lender.loan_because: It's a privilege and a joy to be able to help!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I admire everyone with guts to try.
lender.occupational_info: I record day to day business transactions for a company that sells parking meters.

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Japanese restaurant and hope to travel and teach English in many places around the world some day.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. If people were less self-centered this world would be a much better place.
lender.occupational_info: I'll just say that my job is not one in which I am employed full time in helping people who are most in need. God willing, I'll be able to do this some day while being able to sustain myself.

lender.name: ruth
lender.loan_because: I need to help others. Though I do not have a lot I can help a little

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: It does my heart good to see my money truly make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am an innkeeper. My home is a place where people come to enjoy a quiet and clean place to stay when they are travelling, or need a rest. We also provide meals for them.

lender.name: Joe&Skip
lender.loan_because: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born. -Anias Nin
lender.occupational_info: Sometimes when I reflect back on all the beer I drink I feel ashamed. Then I look into the glass and think about the workers in the brewery and all of their hopes and dreams. If I didn't drink this beer, they might be out of work and their dreams would be shattered. Then I say to myself, 'It is better that I drink this beer and let their dreams come true than be selfish and worry about my liver. -Jack Handy

lender.name: Osay
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part in creating balance in the world.
lender.occupational_info: My worK is at a Prison in Pennsylvania but my job is to show the world what I see through my music

lender.name: Lucinda
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful and simple way to be able to support people create better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hands on healer. My goal is to help individuals heal, while giving support and encouragement, so they feel empowered to make better choices for their own well-being

lender.name: Jacquie
lender.loan_because: It is a way to help people and at the same time feel connected to them. I can see their faces and know the money I give is really helping.
lender.occupational_info: I am semi retired, a private pilot and an artist

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am an undergraduate student majoring in sociology with a Russian studies minor.

lender.name: June
lender.loan_because: I believe in the free market system and Kiva provides me with a way to help others by helping them to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a computer programmer at a major university. Now I am retired and travel around the US fulltime in my motor home.

lender.name: Jen & Gerry
lender.loan_because: We want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Jen is a teacher of 11 to 13 year olds. Gerrys is an Engineer in computer controlled equipment.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: Through international mission trips, my eyes and heart have been opened to those aspiring to better their lives. I have seen in them an amazing spirit of happiness and hope that defies the conditions in which they live. Kiva provides the ingenuity to invest in this spirit.
lender.occupational_info: The bank I work for makes loans to companies owned by individuals who in many ways are not unlike those helped through Kiva.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It's easy to do; I like the idea of helping someone; I can afford to make these small loans; I feel more connected with the rest of the world when I take part in this; the richer western world is obligated to share its wealth with people in poorer countries.
lender.occupational_info: I write for magazines and newspapers (often about motorcycles and motorcycling), I take photographs, I travel and write about my experiences, I help other people by fixing their writing.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, even if I help one person or family at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I help create osteopathic medical education curriculum that is used to teach medical students and residents (doctors-in-training).

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I would love to make a difference in other peoples lives.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I think this is such a great idea.

lender.name: ANDY AND RACHEL
lender.loan_because: WE RECEIVED GIFT CERTIFICATES FROM A FAMILY MEMBER FOR CHRISTMAS, WE APPRECIATE THE OPPORTUNITY TO HELP LESS FORTUNATE BECOME SUCCESSFUL.
lender.occupational_info: WE SELL AND FINANCE HOMES.

lender.name: Alexa
lender.loan_because: I beleive everyone should do something within their own reach to help others in some way. It is the greatest joy a person can have knowing they are helping someone suceed. When someone really thinks about how much they have and how much they need we should all realize we have room for giving to others. I am a working student trying to pay for graduate school so I dont have an abundance of extra money but through this organization we can see how even 25 dollars can help someone else fulfill thier own dreams an goals.
lender.occupational_info: Art Education Student/ Teacher/ Bartender

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: By helping others I receive the pleasant benefit of paying back for the space that I occupy on this planet. And so it is!

lender.name: Kevin and Kelly
lender.occupation: IT Project Manager and Spanish Teacher

lender.name: linda
lender.loan_because: I am so thankful for my family and all of the good people and times I have had. It is good to give back,to help others with their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I am a hospice nurse. I help people to be comfortable and peaceful at the end of life

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be in a position to help those less fortunate and who don't have the opportunities I've had.

lender.name: Linda, Toronto, Canada
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand now and then.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because:
"A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives" - Jackie Robinson
" Be the change you want to see in the world" - Gandhi

lender.name: Michel
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Pay it Forward
lender.occupational_info: I help companies that produce video games run their businesses and find work.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help people.

lender.name: Lyn
lender.loan_because: I recieved a certificate for a gift.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children to find them a forever home.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I see need. Others have helped me when I needed help.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people who own and operate their own small businesses.

lender.name: TONY AND STELLA
lender.loan_because: To loan funds to those who want to improve their lives is the true meaning of compassion. We can help change the world one loan at a time. We thank Kiva for the opportunity.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.occupational_info: MBA Candidate

lender.name: Mark Chow
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: it helps not just one person, but the whole community.
lender.occupational_info: I help the more senior scientists research tyrosinemia (a metabolic disorder), working toward more effective treatments and perhaps - someday - a cure.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: My son Chase gave me a Kiva loan gift certificate for Christmas ~ what could be better than that?!!! I've been given so much that I could never pay it back in one lifetime, so I'm hoping to pay a little forward.

lender.name: Jeff & Melissa
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us.
lender.occupational_info: lawn care - fertilization and weed control of lawns and flowerbeds

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe we all need someone, or something, at sometime. It's a wonderful opportunity to help those who are trying so hard to make a better life.

lender.name: Paulette
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We help small & medium enterprise raise money.

lender.name: Jack
lender.occupational_info: I coach managers to help them make business decision and change the behavior of employees. I also sing for a church and create websites. I used to produce corporate films in San Francisco.

lender.name: Walker
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to invest in our future

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It matters
lender.occupational_info: I run the office that administers local, statre and federal elections in my county.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I can and should... and because a kind friend got me started. :)

lender.name: Jack and Linda
lender.loan_because: We enjoy helping people that desire to try to help themselves !
lender.occupational_info: Jack is retired from the Aggregate/Concrete production business.... Linda is a former Christian School teacher.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a great life. I hope that some day all people can enjoy the life they dream of.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Everybody should have the right to work for an income which supports themselves, their family and their community.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: it feels good to give someone a chance to improve their life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: My nephew gave me a KIVA Gift Certificate for my birthday and I think this is a really great way to help somebody create a brighter future. What a great organization!
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the schools in a school district in northern New Brunswick, Canada.

lender.name: 1st Phoenix Internat.
lender.loan_because: Chief Financial Officer for First Phoenix International which promotes economic development in third world communities and American Indian Reservations.
lender.occupational_info: Coordinating the financial growth of First Phoenix International; investment management; research and coordinate new and existing development projects.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: This financing option is going to sweep across the world; it makes great sense.
lender.occupational_info: I help show doctors how to use new medical device technology in the operating room.

lender.name: Barb and LaMont
lender.loan_because: We feel lucky to live a comfortable life in the United States and want to help others around the world to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired public school teachers; we spend a lot of our time volunteering on projects that assist both our local needy and those in other parts of the world..

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It feels better to give than to receive. I do my best to live a purpose-driven life for God, who has blessed me and my son.
lender.occupational_info: The company I work with assists developers, builders and people who want to open spa (massage, facials, nails, hair care) and wellness centers across the world. We assist them in all phases of spa development, from design to opening and managed services after becoming operational.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to live a comfortable life and the least I can do is help give others the same opportunities that I have.
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve healthcare by providing health care providers with real time easy access to pertinent orgnaized patient data.

lender.name: Vandana
lender.loan_because: I want people to have a chance to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to find houses with the money they have.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: it is an easy way to help others around the world.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: it is an excellent and beautiful way to help increase prosperity to others human beings in need, and because we all should help one another. We are all One.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: everyone should get a chance to make a better life for themselves, and their loved ones
lender.occupational_info: i teach 7th and 8th grade students in Industrial Arts. Next year we will be changing into Career Technology. So as you can see I like to see people who want more in life get a chance to go for it.

lender.name: Mr. & Mrs. P
lender.loan_because: We have a great life, health, a loving family and I have been able to save a little money and would like to see someone else get a chance at their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: My job is a bookkeeper but I do volunteer work as much as I can to give back

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to reach out to others - and it gives me a way to about responsible investing to my Economics students.

lender.name: Patrick and Oly
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: Secure the homeland by day. Kraptruk by night.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: it's for a good cause

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people be able to start their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: my 21-year old son inspires me to be involved.
lender.occupational_info: Accountant

lender.name: Kaley
lender.loan_because: I want to see women empowered - and I'm self-employed, too!
lender.occupational_info: I help people and groups build meaningful relationships.

lender.name: Melisa
lender.loan_because: someone who cares about others gave me a gift certificate to help someone this 2007 holiday season!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a school district and I help children and families be successful through many different projects and activities.

lender.name: Karen and Glenn
lender.loan_because: This is the most exciting venture I've ever been involved with. It's great to be part of the solution for so many needy people.
